Question 2

A. Deferred income tax expense:
   - Deferred income tax expense = (1,000,000) x 10% = 100,000
   - Deferred income tax expense = (1,000,000) x 10% x 1.2 = 12,000
   - Deferred income tax expense = (1,000,000) x (10% - 1.2%) = 7,200
   - Deferred income tax expense = (1,000,000) x (10%) x 1.2 = 12,000
   - Deferred income tax expense = 7,200

B. Deferred income tax expense:
   - Deferred income tax expense = (1,000) x 10% x 1.2 = 12,000
   Deferred income tax expense = (1,000) x (10%) x 1.2 = 12,000
   Deferred income tax expense = 12,000
